A

Actuator - Class in domain
This class represents an abstraction of physical actuator and implements IActuator interface that defines all methods for an actuator.
Actuator(String, int, boolean) - Constructor for class domain.Actuator
Constructor that initialize the name, the pin and a flag that says if the device is digital.
addDevice(String, String, int, boolean) - Method in class system.Middleware
Add device in the configuration file.
addSensorListener(SensorListener) - Method in class domain.Sensor
Add a source as this sensor listener.
addSensorListener(SensorListener) - Method in interface domain.SensorEventSource
Add a SensorListener to the list of listeners.

Adds a TransportLayerListener to listener's list.
addTranportLayerListener(TransportLayerListener) - Method in interface comunication.TransportLayerEventSource
Adds a TransportLayer in the list of listeners.
addUdpPushListener(UdpPushListener) - Method in interface comunication.UdpPushEventSource
Adds UdpPushListener to the list of listeners.

Adds UdpPushListener to the list of listeners.
